When you think of how far you go to go fishing.....Hamilton is small. OK - next Thursday 8 pm at Chaps on Barton. RSVP to me via the board or PM. I will call them and arrange a table for us. Done and settled.

After much thought ~ 2 secs I have come up with a location.......Drum roll please! Cheers Restaurant & Sports Bars Address : 1405 Upper Ottawa, Hamilton, ON Here is a link to a map: http://canada411.yellowpages.ca/bus/Ontari...ars/351866.html See you next Thursday at 8

If you can make it we will see you there, if you can't then perhaps next time.
born in the hammer,grew up in Burlington,moved back to the mountain when i got married,back to Aldershot when the kid's hit school. I don't go far unless it's to fish!!!!!!!!
Mount Hope Rules!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

I Grew up in Mount Hope man!! Hwy #6 and White Church! Kitty Corner from (The Runway 6) one of my first real jobs in fact at the tender age to 12... I basically helped out for pocket change to spend at the bowling alley... errrr uhmmm the tile-it now... man how things have changed out there... I remember being bussed to high school, having pizza @ chewies, and my dad stumbling home from the checked flag...  ahhh good times...  PS.. are you the "Home town Handyman"? seen your van if so....  I used to work for Moss Willis and AWL Contacting (Binbrook) out there... until I busted my hand up good...perhaps you know them? Moss, Greg et al...  things used to be alot different out there hen I was younger compared to now... sub-divisions EVERYWHERE!  It is no longer HWY# 6  it is now Upper James!  Sacrilege!  Gerritt.
